Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that IPSOS has not released any poll on the popularity of presidential aspirants.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or data provided to back up the popularity ratings mentioned in the bogus graphic.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that the popularity ratings in the fake IPSOS graphic represent the true popularity of the presidential aspirants.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanation for the creation and dissemination of the fake IPSOS graphic.
